title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Sometimes, business as usual must come to a halt while you take an ardent stance for a person or principle you believe in. Youre not looking to be a hero today, or even to be seen as particularly brave. However, you feel responsible to protect whats precious. Assimilate the justice-loving ways of warrior Mars as it marches through your 4th House of Domestic Security. You know the difference between whats right and wrong -- and youre willing to let everyone else know too. Activist Gloria Steinem wrote, Whenever one person stands up and says, Wait a minute, this is wrong, it helps other people do the same. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
